thread.title: CNN Airs ‘Live’ Interview With Senator Who Was Somewhere Else
thread.title_full: CNN Airs ‘Live’ Interview With Senator Who Was Somewhere Else

author: Jack Davis
title: CNN Airs ‘Live’ Interview With Senator Who Was Somewhere Else
text:
At the same time, Sasse was visible on C-SPAN 3 as part of Judge Neil Gorsuch’s Supreme Court confirmation hearing. 
The conflicting realities were first unmasked a few minutes later by Fox News host Neil Cavuto . 
“That is one busy guy,” Cavuto said. “He pops up and splits himself into multiple locations.” Advertisement - story continues below 
CNN was also quickly called out by many Twitter users. Proof @CNN #fakenews a live interview with senator sasse when he was asking #GorsuchHearing questions. #FakeNewsMedia pic.twitter.com/bU0Cin6ozV 
— Russian Hacker (@leemgourlay) March 21, 2017 Either Ben Sasse Has A Time Machine, Or CNN Just Got Caught With Its Pants Down… [VIDEO] https://t.co/9IN32xGfJj pic.twitter.com/jBWqWkbfBL 
— Christian Datoc (@TocRadio) March 21, 2017 
One Twitter user wondered if some kind of mystical forces were at work. Advertisement - story continues below
